inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getImage.

imageDigest.description: Sha256 digest of the image manifest. At least one of `image_digest`, `image_tag`, or `most_recent` must be specified.

imageTag.description: Tag associated with this image. At least one of `image_digest`, `image_tag`, or `most_recent` must be specified.

mostRecent.description: Return the most recently pushed image. At least one of `image_digest`, `image_tag`, or `most_recent` must be specified.

registryId.description: ID of the Registry where the repository resides.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getImage.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

imagePushedAt.description: Date and time, expressed as a unix timestamp, at which the current image was pushed to the repository.

imageSizeInBytes.description: Size, in bytes, of the image in the repository.

imageTags.description: List of tags associated with this image.
